document.heading: Motor Vehicle Biennial Inspection Fund Act of 1997

history.narrative: Law 12-13, the “Motor Vehicle Biennial Inspection Fund Act of 1997,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-18, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 4, 1997, and May 6, 1997, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 23, 1997, it was assigned Act No. 12-90 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-13 became effective on September 5, 1997.
